title: Purchasing New Rune Pages Gone?
body: I cannot find the ability to purchase new rune pages on the store. Gameplay Tab only has Runes and Boosts. Please help.

replies.body:
If you hop back onto the Gameplay Tab and ensure the sorting parameters say **Show All** as they do below, you'll see the rune pages pop right up!

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if this did the trick!

I'm also missing Rune pages in my client store. I just tried this method, but the pages weren't there... :/

Edit: Never mind, I'm an idiot...
